cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'maybe' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an out-of-range value '99' will cause hardware configuration failures and cell setup errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為超出範圍的值 '99'，會導致硬體配置失敗和細胞設定錯誤。
